description:
Take Control of Your Finances with the ShopeePay App!

Say hello to a smarter, easier, and more rewarding way to manage your money. ShopeePay is your ultimate financial companion—bringing secure, seamless, and exciting transactions right to your fingertips. Whether you're shopping online, paying in-store, or managing bills, ShopeePay makes it effortless. Get ready to unlock exclusive rewards, flexible payment options and many more!

Why Choose ShopeePay?

SPayLater – Shop Now, Pay Later!
Turn your dreams into reality without the financial stress! SPayLater lets you split your purchases into flexible installments of up to 12 months. Shop today, pay tomorrow—it’s convenience redefined.
Shariah-Compliant and certified by Amanie Advisors.

Daily Rewards & Cashback – Shop Smarter, Earn More!
Who says spending can’t be rewarding? Earn exciting rewards and cashback every time you pay with ShopeePay or SPayLater at your favorite retailers and online stores. From exclusive deals to unbeatable savings, ShopeePay turns every transaction into a win!

Comprehensive Insurance – Your Safety, Secured
Stay protected wherever life takes you. From car and motorcycle insurance to personal accident and travel coverage, ShopeePay offers complete peace of mind with its extensive range of insurance options.

Instant Bill Payments & Mobile Top-ups – Fast & Hassle-Free!
Why wait in line? With ShopeePay, you can settle your bills in seconds or top up your mobile anytime, anywhere. Whether it’s postpaid, internet, water, electricity, or data packages, ShopeePay has you covered—all from the comfort of your home.

Download ShopeePay today and transform the way you shop, save, and manage your money. Your financial freedom starts here—don’t wait to experience it!

Empower your retirement journey — all in one app.

Manage every aspect of your EPF savings effortlessly with the KWSP i-Akaun app.

With this app, you can:

Manage Your Savings
• Register as an EPF member and activate i-Akaun instantly
• Make voluntary contributions (for yourself or other members)
• Switch to Simpanan Shariah or cancel your switch before the effective date
• Activate i-Sayang to transfer contributions to your spouse

Track & Access Account Information
• View account statements, savings history and withdrawal status
• Set savings goals with the retirement calculator
• Receive financial tips and important updates 

Process Transactions Securely
• Authorise online transactions instantly with i-Akaun Secure
• Apply for withdrawals, check status, or cancel applications
• Apply for health/life protection plans
• Manage and update nomination details

All your retirement planning – simplified, secure, and always at your fingertips.

Download the KWSP i-Akaun app today!

Join over 28 million Malaysians who trust TNG eWallet to pay, spend, invest, and manage their everyday financial transactions safely and securely. Regulated by Bank Negara Malaysia (BNM) and Securities Commision Malaysia (SCM), TNG eWallet upholds the highest security standards beyond our industry with biometric logins, multi-factor authentication, and layers of rock-solid protection. TNG eWallet offers a seamless way to handle your finances and elevate your lifestyle — whether it's payments, savings, investments or rewards, all in one powerful digital journey.

GOfinance
An all-in-one financial services hub within your eWallet, designed to transform the way you spend, save, grow, and manage your money. GOfinance offers a comprehensive suite of digital financial services products tailored to meet your needs:
•  Earn daily interest with GO+
• Get essential insurance protection
• Grow your money with a full suite of investment solutions provided by our trusted partners, such as Principal Asset Management, ASNB, CIMB, and Affin Hwang Investment Bank
• Budget and track your expenses effectively with Cash Flow
• Enhance your eWallet’s capabilities with the Touch ‘n Go eWallet Visa Card
• Send money globally with ease via Remittance
• Get the financial boost you need with CashLoan
• Stay on top of your financial well-being with CTOS

GOtravel 
Whether you’re catching a train or booking a seat on the bus, make travelling a breeze with our comprehensive travel products. Spend globally like a local with TNG eWallet, and pay with QR, Visa or even cash! 

Transport 
Skip manual card reloads. With your Touch ‘n Go card in the app, you can pay for tolls and off-street parking straight from your eWallet. 

Bills & Utilities 
Settle your bills — postpaid, utilities, broadband, entertainment, loans, and local council, all from your eWallet. If you are low on credits, you can also reload your prepaid. 

GOrewards 
Get rewarded as you spend with your eWallet and redeem exciting rewards from cashback vouchers to awesome products. Plus, join our monthly lucky draws to win cool prizes. 

Food & Delivery 
Satisfy any craving and have your favourite meals or drinks delivered to your doorstep. 

Entertainment 
Grab your best seats in the cinemas, book handpicked attractions and experiences, and more. 

Shopping 
Shop groceries, electronic gadgets, healthcare and beauty products, and everything you love, and earn cashback while you’re at it! 

Specialty Services 
The TNG eWallet app also offers other specialty services such as Merchant, EZ Qurban, Arus Oil, and more. 

Need help? Our email support is available all day, every day, while our chat support is available from 7am to 10pm daily.

The MAE app has all your M2U banking features and beyond. 
Apart from viewing, tracking, and managing your finances, the MAE app helps you manage tasks and plan your lifestyle with just a few taps. 


Here are a few reasons why the MAE app is the only banking app you need:


Banking
Enjoy all your essential banking features like View Accounts, Bank Transfer, Pay Bills and more!


Security 
Made to keep your info and funds extra secure, the MAE app is equipped with biometric login, instant alerts for your transaction, Secure2u for safer and faster transaction approvals, and the ability to hide your wallet balance whenever you need it. 


Lifestyle
Stay on top of your daily tasks and life goals with the MAE app’s vast array of lifestyle features, like Expenses, Tabung, and Sama-Sama Lokal food delivery. 


How do I get started?
- Maybank customers: 
(i) With M2U ID - simply log in with your M2U ID and all your M2U settings will be automatically synced with the MAE app.
(ii) Without M2U ID - register for one online on the Maybank2u website.
- Non-Maybank customers: skip the queue at the branch and sign up instantly with just your phone to enjoy all the benefits of a Maybank customer.



The MAE app will seek permission for the following:
i. Access to your camera to enable you to scan QR code and also upload documents when you apply for a new product or service.
ii. Access to your contact directory to give you the convenience of selecting your contacts when you make a transaction to a mobile number.
iii. Access to your location to offer you the most relevant food listings, marketing promotions or deals by our merchant partners while you are on the go.
iv. Access to your phone’s audio to enable you to make a direct call to the bank's hotline.
v. Access to your settings to enable push notifications to receive Secure2u alerts.

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Send from: GBP (British pound), EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), AUD (Australian dollar), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), JPY (Japanese yen), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (New Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar)
Send to: EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), GBP (British pound), AED (UAE dirham), ARS (Argentine peso), AUD (Australian dollar), BDT (Bangladeshi taka), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CLP (Chilean peso), CNY (Chinese yuan), CRC (Costa Rican colón), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), EGP (Egyptian pound), GHS (Ghanaian cedi), GEL (Georgian lari), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), IDR (Indonesian rupiah), ILS (Israeli shekel), INR (Indian rupee), JPY (Japanese yen), KES (Kenyan shilling), KRW (South Korean won), LKR (Sri Lankan rupee), MAD (Moroccan dirham), MXN (Mexican peso), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NPR (Nepalese rupee), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PEN (Peruvian sol), PHP (Philippine peso), PKR (Pakistan rupee), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar), THB (Thai baht), TRY (Turkish lira), UAH (Ukrainian hryvnia), VND (Vietnamese dong), ZAR (South African rand), ZMW (Zambian kwacha)

Capital at risk. Past performance does not guarantee future growth. Interest is an investment service, availability and provider vary by location. Please check Wise.com/interest for more information.

Meet Ryt Bank — The World’s First AI-Powered Bank. 

Experience banking done right with speed, simplicity, and innovation. Proudly made in Malaysia, for Malaysians. Built by YTL Digital Capital and Sea Limited.​ Licensed by Bank Negara Malaysia and protected by PIDM for up to RM250,000 per depositor.

Why Ryt Bank?​
• Sign up - As fast as 2 minutes.
• Get paid daily up to 4% p.a. No lock-in.​
• Ryt Card - Unlimited 1.2% cashback on overseas spend, plus zero foreign transaction fees.
• Ryt PayLater - Instant credit up to RM1,499. No documents. No late fees. Flexible installments up to 12 months at low monthly rates. Eligibility checks apply. Plus, enjoy 1.2% cashback when you spend.
• Ryt AI - The magic of effortless banking. Snap, upload and pay in seconds.
• Pay effortlessly with DuitNow transfers, QR payments and scheduled transfers.
• Secure banking right from the start -​ with biometric verification, end-to-end encryption, real-time fraud alerts. We take your security seriously.
• Supports English, Bahasa Melayu, and Mandarin.

This is just the beginning.
Join us in building the bank Malaysians truly deserve — one that’s built to do the right thing, always.

Terms and Conditions:
https://www.rytbank.my/general-terms-and-conditions

Associated Fees:
https://www.rytbank.my/fees-and-limits 
 
Company Information:
Level 37, Menara Southpoint, Mid Valley City
Lingkaran Syed Putra
Kuala Lumpur
Wilayah Persekutuan

Customer Support: 
In-App Live Chat (available 24/7)

Website: 
https://www.rytbank.my 

Business Hours: 8.00AM - 8.00PM (daily)

Download Ryt Bank today.

The CIMB OCTO MY App is packed with services that help you stay on top of your banking
safely and easily, wherever you are.
What you can do with CIMB OCTO MY:
Account Management & Controls
• Check account balance - Manage your Current / Savings / Credit Card / Loan / Investment
accounts
• Fund Transfers - Instant local transfer and fast & low fee foreign transfer
• Set Limit - Take control of your CIMB Clicks / ATM card / Credit card limit in-app
• Debit/Credit Card control - Activate your card, change Card PIN, freeze and Unfreeze
card, adjust your credit limit and overseas spending, and more
• Account linking - Link your Credit Card and CIMB Singapore Account
Payments
• Pay bills & with JomPAY - pay bills such as TNB, Air Selangor, Unifi, Astro, & more
• Pay Cards/Loans - to CIMB and other banks
• Prepaid Mobile Top Up - Instant top-up/reload for Hotlink, Digi Prepaid, XPAX, TuneTalk,
UMobile prepaid, NJoi, etc.
• QR payment - Enjoy faster, cashless checkout across Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand,
Indonesia, and Cambodia
• DuitNow AutoDebit - Manage ad-hoc/recurring payments
• DuitNow Request - Request payments via DuitNow ID
Wealth Management
• eFixed Deposit/-i (eFD/-i) and eTerm Investment Account-i (eTIA-i) - Grow your wealth onthe-
go and enjoy competitive rates. You can make a placement and withdrawal anytime,
anywhere without visiting a branch.
• MyWealth - Manage your investment such as ASNB/Unit Trust with ease in a one-stop
wealth management platform
Security
• SecureTAC - Safer and easier way to approve your transactions. Simply tap to approve. No
more waiting for SMS.
• Lock Clicks ID - You can proactively stop access to your CIMB Clicks ID if you detect any
suspicious activity.
Other feature/services
• OCTO Widget - Add our widget for instant access to Scan QR, DuitNow to Mobile and Bill
Payment
• Apply - You can apply for Personal Loans, cash advance and more
• Mailbox - Send us message for assistance instead of calling
• e-Invoice - Update TIN to receive e-invoices from 1 July 2025
Elevate your banking experience with these personalisation features!
• Homescreen Quick Balance (customisable) - A quick view of your account balance (up to
3 accounts of your choice)
• Homescreen Quick Menu (customisable) - Easier access to your most used banking
functions
• Nickname – Give your transactions a nickname for easier reference
• Save Favorites - Save your frequent billers/recipients as Favorites for speedier
transactions
• Quick Payment - Pay up to RM500 (customizable) with just biometric authentication or a
6-digit passcode, no lengthy password needed
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Stay tuned for more great features built for you!
We will continue to add more features and improve based on your feedback.
Contact us @ https://www.cimb.com.my/en/personal/help-support/contact-us.html
For more information, visit www.cimb.com.my/cimbocto

Open a personal and business account in minutes without branch visits. Borrow up to RM300,000 in minutes and get cash instantly.

PERSONAL BANKING

• FlexiCredit: Apply and get a credit limit of up to RM150,000 at no cost. Drawdown cash instantly into your GX Account when you need.
• Bonus Pockets: Earn up to 4.00% p.a. on your savings up to RM50,000

BUSINESS BANKING

• GX Biz FlexiLoan: Apply and get a business loan of up to RM150,000. Flexible repayments from 2 to 36 months.
• GX Biz Account: Open your business account in minutes. Earn 3.00% p.a. daily interest on your business deposits.

SMARTER SPENDING

• Road-Trip Ready: Renew car insurance & road tax in-app with just 3 taps.
• Travel Protected: Get insurance covering everything from flight delays to scuba diving.
• GX Card: Enjoy unlimited 1% cashback on all your overseas in-store payments with zero markups.
• Grab User?: Get up to 3x GrabCoins when you use GXBank to pay for Grab Services.

PEACE OF MIND, BUILT-IN.

• Secure Login: Access your account with your Face ID or fingerprint.
• Instant Control: Freeze your card or lock your account instantly, 24/7.
• One-Tap Verification: Securely approve all transactions with GXsecure.

Terms and conditions apply. Visit www.gxbank.my for more information.

GXBank is a member of Perbadanan Insurans Deposit Malaysia. Deposits are protected by PIDM up to RM250,000 for each depositor.

Minimum device requirements:
- iOS version 15 and above

Etiqa+ is an all-in-one app created by Etiqa Insurance and Takaful for our customers to: 
	•	View and manage all their policies
-Keep track and get a quick overview of your policies from your mobile device

	•	Get medical assistance
-Locate the nearest medical panel providers to you
-Submit medical claims 
-Request and track the status of guarantee letters (both locally and overseas)
 
	•	24/7 Auto Assist care
-Get help for your vehicle anytime you need it with towing assistance
-Find the nearest workshop to you
 
Earn up to 30% cash rebates with Drive Less Save More
How it works:
-Opt in this FREE add-on when you purchase a motor insurance or policy with us
-Remember to activate this add-on via the app by submitting your vehicle’s odometer reading. Don’t worry, SMS reminders will be sent.
-Once the add-on is successfully activated, you can submit your cash rebate request via the app by uploading your vehicle’s odometer reading anytime during your policy’s active period

How to Get Started
Download the Etiqa+ app and sign up for an account. Simply follow the steps. 

Got an inquiry or need help?
Go to the “Support” tab on the app for further assistance

About this app

The myASNB Mobile App is the official mobile app by Amanah Saham Nasional Berhad, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Permodalan Nasional Berhad that allows its users to safely and conveniently view their ASNB investment portfolio and perform additional investments on their mobile/tablet from anywhere, anytime.

The Features

•	Sign-up for new account
•	View Investment Portfolio
•	Quick view of account balance
•	Perform additional investment
•	Invest in other funds
•	Track recent transactions
•	Download account statement
•	Check fund’s price (NAV)
•	Update profile
•	Find nearest branch

SECURITY

We ensure your account is always protected. Any transaction will require authorisation via TAC sent to your registered mobile number. 

Download and experience it now.

What can you do with CIMB OCTO Biz?
CIMB OCTO Biz Mobile App, Reimagined! Simpler, Faster & Safer!
A wide range of services introduced that will allow you to view your account balances and recent transactions, track the status of your payments and receive notifications when payments need to be authorised. Log in anytime, anywhere, using biometric supported by your device. 


Seamless & Secure
Safeguard your transaction and bank safely with CIMB OCTO Biz. 

More to come!
CIMB OCTO Biz Mobile App is an early version, and we will continue to add more functions and features over time. We encourage you to explore the app and share with us your feedback continuously. Visit https://www.cimb.com.my/en/business/digital-banking/bizchannel-cimb.html for more information.

Welcome to BIMB Mobile - Your Trusted Mobile Banking Partner

Bank smarter with BIMB Mobile, your all-in-one banking app for effortless financial management. With a sleek new design and an enhanced user experience, managing your banking tasks has never been easier.

Key Features
1. Quick & Secure Login
Access your account with ease using biometric login. Enjoy faster, more secure access with Face ID or fingerprint recognition for worry-free banking.

2. Refreshed Dashboard
Navigate your finances with an all-new, intuitive dashboard. Manage your accounts, view transaction history, track your wealth, financing, and card services—all from one simple screen.

3. BIMB Secure for Peace of Mind
Authorize your transactions safely with BIMB Secure, replacing GO Secure. Control your banking with enhanced security measures and get real-time transaction alerts for a safer banking experience.

4. Pay to Billers
Settle bills, credit card payments, or financing accounts instantly. BIMB Mobile makes paying bills quick, easy, and secure.

5. Prepaid Reload
Recharge prepaid mobile numbers in just a few taps—fast and convenient, so you can always stay connected.

6. Sadaqa
Donate to trusted foundations and organizations directly from the app. With BIMB, making a meaningful contribution has never been easier.

7. JomPAY
Pay your bills to over 10,000 billers effortlessly with JomPAY. Skip the queue and take care of payments from wherever you are.

8. Funds Transfer
Sending money to friends or family is seamless. Use DuitNow to transfer funds instantly using just a mobile number.

9. DuitNow QR
Pay to merchants who accept DuitNow QR, Malaysia’s national QR payment standard. Use "Scan & Pay" for easy purchases, or "Scan Me" to receive payments from others instantly.

10. Tabung Haji
Track and manage your Tabung Haji savings effortlessly. View balances, deposit funds, and save for your Hajj journey with ease.

11. Push Notifications
Get instant notifications for every transaction. Stay on top of your banking activities, in real-time.

12. Share Transaction Receipts
Easily share receipts with others via email, WhatsApp, or messaging apps after every transaction.

More Features at Your Fingertips
Update Profile: Manage your personal details quickly.
Change Transaction Limits: Adjust your transaction limits to suit your banking needs.
Latest Promotions: Stay informed of the latest deals and promotions from Bank Islam.
Enhanced Security and Control:
The BIMB Mobile app offers advanced security features:
Biometric Login for added protection.
BIMB Secure for safe transaction authorization.
Kill Switch to immediately disable your account in case of suspicious activity.

Permissions Required:
The app may request access to:
Camera: To update your profile picture.
Contacts: To read and modify your contact list.
Location: To find the nearest Bank Islam branch or ATM.
Phone & Storage: For secure calls to our contact center and storing app data on your device.

Experience the future of banking with BIMB. Download now and enjoy the freedom of managing your finances on the go!
Public Gold application allows you to keep up to date with the live price of Gold, Silver, Dinar, and more. You are also able to book the products and view your previous purchase.

myPTPTN, The Official Mobile App of Perbadanan Tabung Pendidikan Tinggi Nasional (PTPTN)

 

Presenting the new myPTPTN application for faster and easier access to your PTPTN account anytime, anywhere.

 

Key features include:

My Account - view your account information and transaction history
Services - open Simpan SSPN account, add your savings, loan repayment and more
Promotion - stay in the know about PTPTN latest campaigns
Inbox -  receive important notifications and messages  
Profile – update your personal details
Branch -  check it out our PTPTN Offices information near you 
Help - obtain information on repayment, loan and savings
 

If you have not registered for myPTPTN, you may do so by following these simple steps:

Step 1: Open myPTPTN Mobile App and click ‘Register Now’
Step 2: Enter full name as per Identity Card, e-mail information, mobile number and mailing address. Set your password, security phrase & icon
Step 3: You will be given activation email and click link to activate account. Login your myPTPTN to complete the eKYC identity verification process by providing Identity Card and selfie photo
 

Now you can enjoy the services at your fingertips!

 

Experience new excitement in our digital transformation for your endless convenience. Download your myPTPTN mobile application now!

 

YOUR OPPORTUNITY TO SUCCEED

Check out the new myBSN Mobile App! It's an easy and convenient way to handle your banking.
Just use your current myBSN Internet Banking ID to log in. Get ready for a simple and personalized way to manage your money.


Day to day banking is easier with this user friendly myBSN mobile app:


Easy to Use:
- Keep track of your account balance, pay with QR Codes
- Quickly check your account, pay with QR codes
- Make DuitNow tranfers, pay your BSN Credit Cards, financing or loans with just a few taps


Time Saving:
- Get to important banking tasks right from the main screen.
- Bookmark your usual payees for faster payment


Seamless & Secure:
- Feel safe with BSNsecure. It protects your transactions without needing SMS approvals – just tap to authorise.


Coming Soon:
Stay tuned for more great features on the myBSN Mobile App. We're always working to make your banking better.



We Value Your Input!
The myBSN Mobile App is new, and we'd love your help to make it better. Try it out, tell us what you think, and help us improve.



Start using the new app by downloading, registering, and exploring all it has to offer. For more info, visit www.bsn.com.my.

Moomoo, No.1 trading app in Malaysia. Trusted by over 1 million Malaysian users, we’re dedicated to delivering the best trading experience. Get on board with a one‑stop trading app offering products and services powered by Moomoo Securities Malaysia Sdn. Bhd. (“Moomoo MY”).
 
- Diversify your portfolio and visualise global assets such as MY/US/HK/SG Stocks, Fractional Shares, China A-Shares, ADRs, ETFs, REITs, Options, Warrants, Futures, Funds & more. 
 
- Probably your cheapest brokerage in Malaysia: Enjoy 0 commission on MY/US/HK/SG Stocks, ETFs and more for 180 days. 0 IPO subscription fee and 0 CDS account opening fee for Bursa IPOs.
 
----
 
WINNING FEATURES:
 
1. GLOBAL ASSET CLASSES & SHORT SELLS AVAILABLE
- Trade MY/US/HK/SG/CN stocks, options, ETFs, REITs and futures — all in one single app
- Short sell 1,000+ stocks (subject to eligibility and availability)
 
2. CREDIBLE & HIGH ACCURACY TRADING
- Free real-time quotes and Level 2 US market data for deeper insights
- Access to US pre-market & post-market data. 
- 9 advanced order types to simplify execution
 
3. SMART & POWERFUL TOOLS 
- AI-powered monitoring, stock price alerts & more
- In-app stock screeners, stock comparisons, and featured lists
- 24/7 financial news coverage and analysis
- 100+ FREE technical indicators and drawing tools (e.g., VWAP)
 
4. 27 MILLION+ ACTIVE COMMUNITY
- Share your trading ideas and get inspiration worldwide.
- Learn more about prevailing investment trends
- Follow KOLs for timely insights
 
5. WE'RE ONE CALL AWAY!
- 24 hours customer service available during trading days.

IMPORTANT DISCLOSURES:


Moomoo MY: Commission-free for 180 days. Terms, conditions, and other fees apply.

In Malaysia, investment products and services on the moomoo app are offered by Moomoo Securities Malaysia Sdn. Bhd. (“Moomoo MY”), regulated by the Securities Commission Malaysia (SC). This advertisement has not been reviewed by the SC.

Investments in capital market products carry risk, including possible loss of the amount invested. Values may fluctuate, and clients may lose more than their original investment.

No content in the App description shall be considered a recommendation or solicitation for the purchase or sale of securities, futures, or other investment products. All information and data in the App description are for reference only and no historical data shall be indicative of future performance.

MyPB App - the next generation for mobile banking by Public Bank is now here! Immerse yourself in a wholly new banking experience coupled with a variety of lifestyle services at one place.

Spend and earn AEON Points effortlessly with our all-in-one app!
●	AEON Wallet can be used with any AEON Credit Card.
●	Scan QR code to make payment at all AEON stores.
●	Store all your AEON points in the app and earn points wherever you go.
●	Convert your points to cash!
●	Instant top-up anytime, anywhere with no hassle and extra charges.
●	Check your balance and transaction history in real-time.
●	State-of-the-art security measures with biometric login, multi-factor authentication, anti-phishing features and more.

The AEON Wallet App is a must-have for new and existing AEON customers. Download it now and enjoy:
●	all the perks, convenience and exclusive benefits.

THiJARI is an app which allows TH Depositors to access and manage their own TH accounts and other TH related services such as:

1.	TH Accounts
•	Account Overview (Primary/Trustee)
•	Account Statement
•	Fund Transfer to TH Own Account (Trustee account)/ 3rd Party Account
•	Fund Transfer from Other Bank to TH Account
•	Direct Debit Services (Monthly frequent transfer)

2.	Hajj Services
•	Hajj Registration (Individual/allow for Group for the first-time registration only)
•	Hajj Registration for My Trustee only
•	Hajj Registration Status Checking
•	Hajj Offer Checking/ Hajj Offer Acceptance
•	Hajj Flight Schedule Letter
•	Hajj Course
•	Hajj Appeal
•	Dam Payment for selected Hajj Pilgrims only

3.	Kelab TaHa Services
•	Kelab TaHa - E-Membership Card
•	Rakan Kelab TaHa - Directory & Locator

4.	Other Services
•	My Dashboard
•	View Nomination/ Hibah Amanah
•	Opening of New TH account
•	Opening Trustee Account (child under 18 years old)
•	Qurban
•	Sadaqah
•	Monthly Salary Distribution
•	eTelegraphic Transfer Application
•	TH Khairat

HLB Connect App is designed to make your day-to-day banking easy with its features that enable you to get more done without having to step foot in a bank’s branch or to call the Contact Center. The app offers language options (English, BM & Chinese) and Day/Night mode for your customisation.

    •  Account overviews – Check balances, view transaction histories, download e-statements.
    •  Fund Transfers – Send money via QR Code, recipients’ account number, mobile number or other IDs.
    •  Bill Payments – Pay up to five billers within a single transaction.
    •  Fixed Deposits – Place or withdraw Fixed Deposits using funds from your account with HLB or other banks.
    •  Credit Card Services – Instant reporting of lost/ stolen card or fraud, instant approval of temporary increase in credit limit, request for card replacement, Balance Transfer, Flexi Payment Plan, Quick Cash and more.
    •  Prepaid reload and cardless Connect ATM withdrawal.
    •  Manage Debit Card settings, daily transaction limits and more.

Less time spent banking, means more time for everything else. Download now.

The upgraded version of the AffinAlways mobile app, AffinAlwaysX, is here to elevate your banking experience with that extra X factor. It retains all your essential banking features—account management, fund transfers, and bill payments—while introducing a more streamlined and enhanced user journey. From its sleek interface to its seamless navigation, AffinAlwaysX is designed to make managing your finances easier and faster.


Key Features and Benefits:


Simpler Design, Simplified Journey


Easy on the eyes and effortless on the hands. AffinAlwaysX adopts a user-centered design that prioritises intuitive and seamless navigation. With its clean and modern interface, users can complete transactions effortlessly and efficiently, making every banking experience smooth and efficient.


QR Pay


Pay or receive payments with just a scan. Whether you’re settling a bill at a merchant or transferring money to an individual, simply scan the QR code—fast, easy, and secure.

Quick Access

Your essentials, right at your fingertips. Frequently used features are now front and center, ensuring quick and easy access to payments, transfers, and more.

AffinSecure Authorisation

Enjoy fast, one-tap approval for all transactions. With AffinSecure integrated into the app, you get enhanced security with minimal effort.

Effortless Account Management

A comprehensive suite of features to help you check your account balances, review transaction history, and monitor your expenses—all with just a few taps.

Seamless Transactions

Transfer funds or make bill payments instantly—whenever it's convenient for you. And the best part? It's completely hassle-free.

Ready to elevate your banking experience? AffinAlwaysX offers greater convenience, enhanced security, and a more intuitive journey. Whether you're paying bills, transferring funds, or managing your accounts, AffinAlwaysX ensures everything you need is simplified, streamlined, and secure.
